review: He is an excellent pediatrician. Do not give unnnecessary advices. Clarifies all the doubts and makes things understand, very polite and gentle doctor. Its been 2 years, we get treatement of our child under his guidance.

Dr. Sunil is highly recommended as a pediatrician. *** ********* ** ******* *** does not believe in giving antibiotics very often.

Above all, he is a very good listener and highly approachable.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor uncle is really good. He listens to all our concerns patiently and gives answers to even silliest of questions. He doesn't prescribe medicines unnecessarily and comforts us whenever we come to meet him. He is a very humble person and a great guide for first time parents. He is the most patient doctor i ever came across. Meeting him is value formoney.  We meet him every month even if there is no concern.
